markdownRemark.html: The Souk of Cordoba is a Traditional Arab Market, located in a two-story Mudéjar building, with a porticoed courtyard, where artisans who make their products, expose themselves to the public eye. This shopping area is located in Calle Judíos, next to the Plaza de Maimónides, halfway between the Mosque-Cathedral and the Puerta de Almodóvar and is a must-visit in Cordoba.

frontmatter.title: Zoco Shopping
